headline: Regional Management Corp. Names Lakhbir Lamba as President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director
summary: GREENVILLE, S.C., November 05, 2025--Regional Management Corp. (NYSE: RM), a diversified consumer finance company, announced today the retirement of its President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director, Robert W. Beck. The Board of Directors has appointed Lakhbir Lamba as Regional’s new President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director effective November 10, 2025. Mr. Beck will assist with a smooth and orderly transition in an advisory role before officially retiring from the company on June 30,

content.title: Regional Management Corp. Names Lakhbir Lamba as President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director
content.summary: GREENVILLE, S.C., November 05, 2025--Regional Management Corp. (NYSE: RM), a diversified consumer finance company, announced today the retirement of its President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director, Robert W. Beck. The Board of Directors has appointed Lakhbir Lamba as Regional’s new President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director effective November 10, 2025. Mr. Beck will assist with a smooth and orderly transition in an advisory role before officially retiring from the company on June 30,
